alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 7:40PM CST until February 05 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. For the Tennesse-Tombigbee River ...including Tibbee, Stennis Lock & Dam, Columbus, Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water begins to back into cattle farmland from the southwest just east of Highway 45. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 26.5 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 26.0 21.3 Thu 7 pm CST 26.5 25.4 22.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 800 AM CST.
